channel.title: Declaring Variables
channel.description: Hey guys I am getting this error [code].\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:37: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcId2 location: class server.model.players.Client c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5); ^ .\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isNpc location: class server.model.players.Client c.isNpc = true;[/code] I know i have to declare a variable. but is this the right variable for one of them. [code]public void isNpc();[/code] I also put this in the client.java Thanks.

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

S-J is right, you are trying to declare a method in an abstract way, and I donâ€™t know why.

item.title: Declaring Variables
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Thats not a variable, what you put in your client is a public void.
http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/variables.html

ThoughtCo

Learn How to Declare Variables in Java

The use of variables is key to any program and normally one of the first things to happen in any program. Learn about declaring variables in Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Declaring Variables
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Hey guys I am getting this error

.\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:37: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcId2 location: class server.model.players.Client c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5); ^ .\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isNpc location: class server.model.players.Client c.isNpc = true;
I know i have to declare a variable.
but is this the right variable for one of them.

I also put this in the client.java
Thanks.

Read full topic
